meanings.definition: The emergence of a baby or other young from the body of its mother.
meanings.sent1: Many animal births happen in the spring when the weather gets warmer.
meanings.sent2: The hospital had a record number of births last month.
meanings.sent3: The zookeeper joked that the giraffe's birth was so quick, it caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The birth of a new idea can sometimes lead to great discoveries.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the birth of a baby elephant was a truly magical experience.

meanings.definition: The beginning or coming into existence of something.
meanings.sent1: The birth of a new company brought excitement to the small town.
meanings.sent2: The birth of a friendship can happen in unexpected places.
meanings.sent3: The birth of a new hobby sparked creativity in her life.
meanings.sent4: The birth of a star in the music industry can change lives overnight.
meanings.sent5: The birth of a rainbow after the storm was a beautiful sight to behold.
